channel.title: Need help spawning a Kalphite Queen
channel.description: The kalphite queen in my server is glitched and says "your attack has no effect on the kalphite queen" I looked for the real kalphite queen, changed the NPC code, compiled, and restarted server. The real KQ spawned in, but once you kill it, the glitched one respawns. How do i make it so the RESPAWN KQ is the real one that you can attack? Help please?

item.title: Need help spawning a Kalphite Queen
item.dc:creator: @dwhalen9 dwhalen9
item.description:
@dwhalen9 wrote:

It says that because kalphite queen must be attacked by a certain combat style. so mage, mele, or range. you would have to change it through coding if you wanted it to be attacked by any.

The real KQ spawned in, but once you kill it, the glitched one respawns. How do i make it so the RESPAWN KQ is the real one that you can attack? Help please?
